name: Space Retro Raid
description:
You're a pilot of a spaceship. Your task is simple - destroy as many enemies as you can to reach the boss (not added yet). Beat the highscore and buy some new stuff for points.

In the future, I'd like to add: More player ships possible to modify in your spacebase. More levels and leaderboard.

For now, you have a very short gameplay. Just destroy everything!!!

If you have some feedback for me, just leave a comment.
